on reading compounds: 刎頚の友【フンケイノトモ】inseparable friend, sworn friend
自刎【ジフン】committing suicide by slitting one's throat
kun reading compounds: 撥ねる【はねる】to hit (e.g. to have a car hit someone), to run into, to reject, to deny, to refuse, to eliminate, to exclude, to leave out, to flip, to splash, to splatter, to decapitate, to behead, to jump up, to point or curl up (e.g. ends of hair)
